tha-ap260:0.3_0: held over his shoulder and his feet.
tha-ap260:2.2_0: you’ll come me as a merchant,
tha-ap260:2.3_0: I paid homage to the Buddha,
tha-ap260:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap260:3.4_0: I drew the fruits in reed.
tha-ap260:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap260:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pañcālacaṇḍa.
tha-ap260:7.1_0: the eighth part of the senior monks have been depraved by the senior monks.
